blocDescription: Barrier to scaled development or adoption of cultivated meat
blocCriteria: All themes are phrased as problems facing the development or adoption of cultivated meat

blocDescription: Opportunity for cultivated meat to solve a problem with existing food systems
blocCriteria: All themes are phrased as problems with conventional food systems or benefits of cultivated meat

blocDescription: Negative outcome of scaled development and adoption of cultivated meat
blocCriteria: All themes are phrased as pitfalls of scaled cultivated meat development and adoption

blocDescription: Aspects of existing food systems that may not be replacable with cultivated meat
blocCriteria: All themes are phrased as benefits of conventional food systems
